arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩
footnotes: Na pindi wakizisikia Aya za Qur'ani hawasujudu wakanyenyekea?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā quri-a ʿalayhimu al-qur'ānu lā yasjudūna
